title: Location Profile
reference-usage: Use this specfic profile header to display a client's location. This allows for consistency as you navigate through the respective information within the profile itself.
reference-details:
Background Color

The background color for this profile is #A9BCD3.

Icon

The icon that is representative of the country/location should be used for the Location profile. For example:
reference-mobile: When the profiles are viewed on mobile/tablet devices, the navigation links will appear as a slidedown menu. Users will click on a menu icon to view the navigation that can be toggled. The demographic information that may appear in a profile header will be displayed once the user clicks on the demographic icon next to the menu icon and can be toggled on and off. The Identifier and 2nd level Identifier (header and subheader) will ellipse if necessary.
